00044   public:
00045     OpenFileDataKosmos(int _fd, int _flags) : fd(_fd), flags(_flags) { return; }
00046     virtual ~OpenFileDataKosmos() {
00047       KFS::KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
